resources.string:
I love dogs. 

The kind that is playful and runs around in the backyard or park, or a field, and definitely loves walks. 
Fun fact is that there are several different kinds of dogs 

Some of my favorite dog breeds are German Shepherds, St. Bernards, Huskies, Labs, and Great Danes. 
Dogs are wonderful, and I hope to have another one some day. 
In addition to loving dogs, I also like cats. 

 I have two cats of my own, and wish I could get a dog too, however my current home doesnt allow for it. 

I'll be happy to get a dog one day after I buy my own house. 
One day, after all my hard work in school pays off with a new job!
